desc: A fabulous range of stunning hand crafted, artisanal homestyle products, gifts, decor and furniture, along with our superbly festive Christmas decoration range to add some colour, creativity and fun to your home.

layout.text: We are a Dubai based, passionate small business, bringing quirky, often unique, but always fun gifts and home decor products to the UAE. Our range is sourced from across the globe with many of our line lovingly hand-crafted by our wonderful artisanal craft makers in South East Asia and the rest picked up wherever in the world it wowed us. Thank you for supporting our small business where every sale generates a sincere smile.
